long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension for a mini game called keep Orbt!
which is avoiding planets and the black hole by controlling the distance to the black hole.
you can press Spacebar or click the screen to increase the distance and release it to decrease the distance. 
The basic purpose of the extension is killing time, and entertainment.

Click or "Spacebar" to go further. red and blue circles are planets you should avoid, white circle is an item that gives you +3 bounus points.

The reference of this game is from "Orbt XL" and you can find it on the steam.
